Pacers are 1-6. It's been 28 years since a team started 1-6 and made the playoffs.

That team? The 1993-94 Indiana Pacers. 

Those Pacers beat the Celtics to improve to 2-6. Given the injuries to the 2021-22 Pacers, there's a chance but it's clearly not a very good chance.
